net.sf.jclec.realarray.mut

Class PolynomialMutator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.base.AbstractMutator
      • net.sf.jclec.realarray.RealArrayMutator
        • net.sf.jclec.realarray.UniformMutator
          • net.sf.jclec.realarray.mut.PolynomialMutator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure, net.sf.jclec.IMutator, net.sf.jclec.ITool, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC

    public class PolynomialMutator
extends net.sf.jclec.realarray.UniformMutator
    Polynomial Mutator.

    Paper: K. Deb, M. Goyal, "A combined genetic adaptive search (GeneAS) for engineering design." Computer Science and Informatics, vol.26(4), pp. 30-45, 1996.

    HISTORY:

    • (AR|JRR|SV, 1.0, March 2018) First release.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aurora Ramirez (AR), Jose Raul Romero (JRR), Sebastian Ventura (SV)

    Knowledge Discovery and Intelligent Systems (KDIS) Research Group: http://www.uco.es/grupos/kdis

    See Also:
    UniformMutator, Serialized Form
